title: Freelance Web Developer
description: Designing and developing Wordpress website using YooTheme Pro Page Builder, curating an intuitive, simple, and modern web interface with a focus to not overwhelm users. Communicating with clients about web components and technical requirements in a non-technical manner to share ideas, get input, and decide on features for the website.

title: Head of Front-End Engineering
description: Driving seamless large scale web app development by contributing, refactoring, reviewing, testing, and approving code to create a high-performance Frontend. Leading a team of 12 Front-End engineers establishing project workflows to enhance productivity and efficiency, ensuring the timely delivery of high-performing, user-rich, scalable Web Components.

title: Software Engineer
description: Utilizing TypeScript and React Native to create User Interface Designs and UI/UX optimized for user-friendly interfaces and experiences on mobile and web. Collaborating closely with designers to translate designs made in Figma into dynamic and responsive Front-End experiences through continuous User Testing and Development.

title: Software Engineer
description: Utilizing TypeScript, React, and Tailwind to create and refine Web components to create a social network web application. Integrating API created by Back-End team, as well as communicating them of necessary end points that need to be created for high-performing custom web components.
